setup: CREATE TABLE doctor (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), specialization VARCHAR(50), is_government BOOLEAN, years_experience INT);
INSERT INTO doctor (id, name, specialization, is_government, years_experience) VALUES (1, 'Dr. A. Sinha', 'Cardiology', TRUE, 12);
INSERT INTO doctor (id, name, specialization, is_government, years_experience) VALUES (2, 'Dr. R. Mehra', 'Dermatology', FALSE, 8);
INSERT INTO doctor (id, name, specialization, is_government, years_experience) VALUES (3, 'Dr. Neha Shah', 'Cardiology', TRUE, 6);
INSERT INTO doctor (id, name, specialization, is_government, years_experience) VALUES (4, 'Dr. I. Qureshi', 'Neurology', FALSE, 15);
query: SELECT name, years_experience FROM doctor WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
